mc.name: Avarice Totem
mc.oracleText: {5}: Exchange control of Avarice Totem and target nonland permanent.
mc.printedText: {5}: Exchange control of Avarice Totem and target nonland permanent.
mc.flavorText: Souls and steel, the essence of Mirrodin. Memnarch lacks one but has an abundance of the other.

mc.name: Cosmic Larva
mc.oracleText:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Cosmic Larva unless you sacrifice two lands.
mc.printedText:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Cosmic Larva unless you sacrifice two lands.
mc.flavorText: For millennia they wandered from plane to plane, devouring all metal. Finally, their wanderings are over.

mc.name: Relic Barrier
mc.oracleText: {T}: Tap target artifact.
mc.printedText: {T}: Tap target artifact.
mc.flavorText: Its transmissions are the word of Memnarch. It speaks, and metal bows.

mc.name: Iron-Barb Hellion
mc.oracleText:
Haste
Iron-Barb Hellion can't block.
mc.printedText:
Haste
Iron-Barb Hellion can't block.
mc.flavorText: When you feel a rumble in the ground, hold perfectly still. One sound will bring the hellion.

mc.name: Feedback Bolt
mc.oracleText: Feedback Bolt deals damage to target player equal to the number of artifacts you control.
mc.printedText: Feedback Bolt deals damage to target player equal to the number of artifacts you control.
mc.flavorText: The path of least resistance is often through your enemies.

mc.name: Fill with Fright
mc.oracleText:
Target player discards two cards.
Scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
mc.printedText:
Target player discards two cards from his or her hand.
Scry 2 (Look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

mc.name: Auriok Windwalker
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{T}: Attach target Equipment you control to target creature you control.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{T}: Attach target Equipment you control to target creature you control.
mc.flavorText: Each generation, a handful of Auriok girls are allowed to visit the Cave of Light. They return riding the wind and brandishing steel.

mc.name: Energy Chamber
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one - Put a +1/+1 counter on target artifact creature; or put a charge counter on target noncreature artifact.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one Put a +1/+1 counter on target artifact creature; or put a charge counter on target noncreature artifact.

mc.name: Helm of Kaldra
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature has first strike, trample, and haste.
{1}: If you control Equipment named Helm of Kaldra, Sword of Kaldra, and Shield of Kaldra, put a legendary 4/4 colorless Avatar creature token named Kaldra into play and attach those Equipment to it.
Equip {2}
mc.printedText:
Equipped creature has first strike, trample, and haste.
{1}: If you control Equipment named Helm of Kaldra, Sword of Kaldra, and Shield of Kaldra, put a 4/4 colorless Avatar Legend creature token named Kaldra into play and attach those Equipment to it.
Equip {2}

mc.name: Qumulox
mc.oracleText:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)
Flying
mc.printedText:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)
Flying
mc.flavorText: Even the clouds bend themselves to Memnarch's will, eager to swallow those who oppose him.

mc.name: Suncrusher
mc.oracleText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
{4}, {T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Suncrusher: Destroy target creature.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Suncrusher: Return Suncrusher to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
{4}, {T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Suncrusher: Destroy target creature.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Suncrusher: Return Suncrusher to its owner's hand.

mc.name: Goblin Cannon
mc.oracleText: {2}: Goblin Cannon deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Sacrifice Goblin Cannon.
mc.printedText: {2}: Goblin Cannon deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Sacrifice Goblin Cannon.
mc.flavorText: Goblin cannon crews are known not for their aim but for their ability to dive for cover.

mc.name: Fist of Suns
mc.oracleText: You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay the mana cost for spells that you play.
mc.printedText: You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay the mana cost for spells that you play.
mc.flavorText:
"It is all in my grasp. Every petty dream, every grand scheme, every soul, every fear. It all flows through me and from me."
--Memnarch

mc.name: Possessed Portal
mc.oracleText:
If a player would draw a card, that player skips that draw instead.
At the end of each turn, each player sacrifices a permanent unless he or she discards a card.
mc.printedText:
If a player would draw a card, that player skips that draw instead.
At the end of each turn, each player sacrifices a permanent unless he or she discards a card from his or her hand.

mc.name: Vedalken Shackles
mc.oracleText:
You may choose not to untap Vedalken Shackles during your untap step.
{2}, {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of Islands you control as long as Vedalken Shackles remains tapped.
mc.printedText:
You may choose not to untap Vedalken Shackles during your untap step.
{2}, {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of Islands you control as long as Vedalken Shackles remains tapped.

mc.name: Endless Whispers
mc.oracleText: Each creature has "When this creature is put into a graveyard from play, choose target opponent. That player puts this creature card from that graveyard into play under his or her control at end of turn."
mc.printedText: Each creature has "When this creature is put into a graveyard from play, choose target opponent. That player puts this creature card from that graveyard into play under his or her control at end of turn."
mc.flavorText: Those who find death under the black sun's shadow cannot escape its pull.

mc.name: Vedalken Orrery
mc.oracleText: You may play nonland cards as though they had flash.
mc.printedText: You may play nonland cards any time you could play an instant.
mc.flavorText: The model incorporated the fifth sun effortlessly, as if it had always known.

mc.name: Skyhunter Prowler
mc.oracleText: Flying, vigilance (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
Attacking doesn't cause Skyhunter Prowler to tap.
mc.flavorText:
"If what I have seen comes to pass, we will need our guardians more than ever."
--Ushanti, leonin seer

mc.name: Loxodon Anchorite
mc.oracleText: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.flavorText: The loxodon ascribe religious superiority to those born albino, believing them to be spiritually pure.

mc.name: Stand Firm
mc.oracleText:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
mc.printedText:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Scry 2 (Look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

mc.name: Engineered Explosives
mc.oracleText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a charge counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
{2}, Sacrifice Engineered Explosives: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Engineered Explosives.
mc.printedText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a charge counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
{2}, Sacrifice Engineered Explosives: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Engineered Explosives.

mc.name: Beacon of Immortality
mc.oracleText: Double target player's life total. Shuffle Beacon of Immortality into its owner's library.
mc.printedText: Double target player's life total. Shuffle Beacon of Immortality into its owner's library.
mc.flavorText: The cave floods with light. A thousand rays shine forth and meld into one.

mc.name: Advanced Hoverguard
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{U}: Advanced Hoverguard gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
{U}: Advanced Hoverguard can't be the target of spells or abilities this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"They are like their vedalken masters: untouchable, aloof, and omnipresent."
--Bruenna, Neurok leader

mc.name: Serum Visions
mc.oracleText:
Draw a card.
Scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
mc.printedText:
Draw a card.
Scry 2 (Look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

mc.name: Into Thin Air
mc.oracleText:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)
Return target artifact to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)
Return target artifact to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText:
"Perhaps I should take Mirrodin apart and begin again."
--Memnarch

mc.name: Gemstone Array
mc.oracleText:
{2}: Put a charge counter on Gemstone Array.
Remove a charge counter from Gemstone Array: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
{2}: Put a charge counter on Gemstone Array.
Remove a charge counter from Gemstone Array: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: Outside, it reflects the suns' light. Inside, it harvests the suns' power.

mc.name: Razormane Masticore
mc.oracleText:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Razormane Masticore unless you discard a card.
At the beginning of your draw step, you may have Razormane Masticore deal 3 damage to target creature.
mc.printedText:
First strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Razormane Masticore unless you discard a card from your hand.
At the beginning of your draw step, you may have Razormane Masticore deal 3 damage to target creature.

mc.name: Chimeric Coils
mc.oracleText: {X}{1}: Chimeric Coils becomes an X/X Construct artifact creature. Sacrifice it at end of turn.
mc.printedText: {X}{1}: Chimeric Coils becomes an X/X artifact creature. Sacrifice it at end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The energy that infuses the rings with life also melts them away, leaving only useless puddles of slag.

mc.name: Opaline Bracers
mc.oracleText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a charge counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of charge counters on Opaline Bracers.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
mc.printedText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a charge counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of charge counters on Opaline Bracers.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

mc.name: Conjurer's Bauble
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Conjurer's Bauble: Put up to one target card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library. Draw a card.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Conjurer's Bauble: Put up to one target card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library. Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: It is the moment of discovery, the triumph of the mind, the reimagining of past glory.

mc.name: Staff of Domination
mc.oracleText:
{1}: Untap Staff of Domination.
{2}, {T}: You gain 1 life.
{3}, {T}: Untap target creature.
{4}, {T}: Tap target creature.
{5}, {T}: Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
{1}: Untap Staff of Domination.
{2}, {T}: You gain 1 life.
{3}, {T}: Untap target creature.
{4}, {T}: Tap target creature.
{5}, {T}: Draw a card.

mc.name: Trinket Mage
mc.oracleText: When Trinket Mage comes into play, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: When Trinket Mage comes into play, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

mc.name: Abuna's Chant
mc.oracleText:
Choose one - You gain 5 life; or prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
mc.printedText:
Choose one You gain 5 life; or prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

mc.name: Fangren Pathcutter
mc.oracleText: Whenever Fangren Pathcutter attacks, attacking creatures gain trample until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Fangren Pathcutter attacks, attacking creatures gain trample until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Tracking a fangren pack is easy. Catching up to one is fatal."
--Viridian scout

mc.name: Artificer's Intuition
mc.oracleText: {U}, Discard an artifact card: Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: {U}, Discard an artifact card from your hand: Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Myr Quadropod
mc.oracleText: {3}: Switch Myr Quadropod's power and toughness until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {3}: Switch Myr Quadropod's power and toughness until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Each myr was designed to fill a specific role. This one, for example, was designed to stomp on other myr.

mc.name: Thermal Navigator
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice an artifact: Thermal Navigator gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice an artifact: Thermal Navigator gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: It takes off with a roar of superheated wind, startling wild pterons as they survey the ground below.

mc.name: Myr Servitor
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Myr Servitor is in play, each player returns all cards named Myr Servitor from his or her graveyard to play.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Myr Servitor is in play, each player returns all cards named Myr Servitor from his or her graveyard to play.
mc.flavorText: The Krark Clan enjoys pulling them apart just to watch them reassemble one another.

mc.name: Viridian Lorebearers
mc.oracleText: {3}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts your opponents control.
mc.printedText: {3}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts your opponents control.
mc.flavorText: A small band of elves pledged many years ago to avoid the Edges of Forgetting. They have remained hidden until now.

mc.name: Ouphe Vandals
mc.oracleText: {G}, Sacrifice Ouphe Vandals: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source and destroy that artifact if it's in play. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
mc.printedText: {G}, Sacrifice Ouphe Vandals: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source and destroy that artifact if it's in play. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
mc.flavorText: The ouphes finally managed to still the clockwork monstrosity by catching themselves in its cogs.

mc.name: Tel-Jilad Justice
mc.oracleText:
Destroy target artifact.
Scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
mc.printedText:
Destroy target artifact.
Scry 2 (Look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

mc.name: Tyrranax
mc.oracleText: {1}{G}: Tyrranax gets -1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}{G}: Tyrranax gets -1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: It outnumbers you one to many.

mc.name: Heliophial
mc.oracleText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a charge counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
{2}, Sacrifice Heliophial: Heliophial deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of charge counters on Heliophial.
mc.printedText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a charge counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
{2}, Sacrifice Heliophial: Heliophial deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of charge counters on Heliophial.

mc.name: Clearwater Goblet
mc.oracleText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a charge counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life for each charge counter on Clearwater Goblet.
mc.printedText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a charge counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life for each charge counter on Clearwater Goblet.

mc.name: Krark-Clan Engineers
mc.oracleText: {R}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Destroy target artifact.
mc.printedText: {R}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Destroy target artifact.
mc.flavorText: "Well, I jammed the whatsit into the whackdoodle, but I think I broke the thingamajigger."

mc.name: Tangle Asp
mc.oracleText: Whenever Tangle Asp blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
mc.printedText: Whenever Tangle Asp blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
mc.flavorText:
"I have no fangs, yet I constantly bite. I have no scales, yet I slither through you. What am I?"
--Riddle of the viper's venom

mc.name: Desecration Elemental
mc.oracleText:
Fear
Whenever a player plays a spell, sacrifice a creature.
mc.printedText:
Fear
Whenever a player plays a spell, sacrifice a creature.
mc.flavorText: Its precious corpses dance like puppets to attract mindless nim prey.

mc.name: Lose Hope
mc.oracleText:
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
mc.printedText:
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Scry 2 (Look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

mc.name: Fleshgrafter
mc.oracleText: Discard an artifact card: Fleshgrafter gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Discard an artifact card from your hand: Fleshgrafter gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Necrogen enflames certain emotional centers in the Morioks' brains: hate, aggression, and especially greed.

mc.name: Devour in Shadow
mc.oracleText: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. You lose life equal to that creature's toughness.
mc.printedText: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. You lose life equal to that creature's toughness.
mc.flavorText:
"Feel the burn of the mists. Master them. They will devour your enemies."
--Geth, keeper of the Vault

mc.name: Mephidross Vampire
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Each creature you control is a Vampire in addition to its other creature types and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."
mc.printedText:
Flying
Each creature you control is a Vampire in addition to its other creature types and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."

mc.name: Blind Creeper
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays a spell, Blind Creeper gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player plays a spell, Blind Creeper gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: It shuns everything except its next meal.

mc.name: Retaliate
mc.oracleText: Destroy all creatures that dealt damage to you this turn.
mc.printedText: Destroy all creatures that dealt damage to you this turn.
mc.flavorText: The Auriok learned perseverance from their forebears. They learned justice from the leonin.

mc.name: Vedalken Mastermind
mc.oracleText: {U}, {T}: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: {U}, {T}: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: The vedalken see other beings from a cold distance, as either experimental subjects or objects of study.

mc.name: Grafted Wargear
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature gets +3/+2.
Whenever Grafted Wargear becomes unattached from a permanent, sacrifice that permanent.
Equip {0} ({0}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
mc.printedText:
Equipped creature gets +3/+2.
Whenever Grafted Wargear becomes unattached from a creature, sacrifice that creature.
Equip {0} ({0}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

mc.name: Summoner's Egg
mc.oracleText:
Imprint - When Summoner's Egg comes into play, you may remove a card in your hand from the game face down.
When Summoner's Egg is put into a graveyard from play, turn the imprinted face-down card face up. If that card is a creature card, put it into play under your control.
mc.printedText:
Imprint When Summoner's Egg comes into play, you may remove a card in your hand from the game face down.
When Summoner's Egg is put into a graveyard from play, turn the imprinted face-down card face up. If that card is a creature card, put it into play under your control.

mc.name: Steelshaper's Gift
mc.oracleText: Search your library for an Equipment card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for an Equipment card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: Some blades seek their own wielders.

mc.name: Roar of Reclamation
mc.oracleText: Each player returns all artifact cards from his or her graveyard to play.
mc.printedText: Each player returns all artifact cards from his or her graveyard to play.
mc.flavorText:
"Yesterday's relics will determine the outcome of tomorrow's war."
--Ushanti, leonin seer

mc.name: Hoverguard Sweepers
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Hoverguard Sweepers comes into play, you may return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Hoverguard Sweepers comes into play, you may return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
mc.flavorText: They only appear in emergencies, and emergencies never last long.

mc.name: Acquire
mc.oracleText: Search target opponent's library for an artifact card and put that card into play under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
mc.printedText: Search target opponent's library for an artifact card and put that card into play under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
mc.flavorText: Sometimes "innovation" means "stealing another's secret before anyone else can."

mc.name: Moriok Rigger
mc.oracleText: Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from play, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Moriok Rigger.
mc.printedText: Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from play, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Moriok Rigger.
mc.flavorText: The Moriok scavenge for weapons, for armor, for food--and ultimately for their souls.

mc.name: Shattered Dreams
mc.oracleText: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. Choose an artifact card from it. That player discards that card.
mc.printedText: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. Choose an artifact card from it. That player discards that card.
mc.flavorText: Victims are lucky if they remember ever having had what was lost.

mc.name: Ebon Drake
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever a player plays a spell, you lose 1 life.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever a player plays a spell, you lose 1 life.
mc.flavorText: The deadliest killers serve only those who are not afraid to die.

mc.name: Krark-Clan Ogre
mc.oracleText: {R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature can't block this turn.
mc.printedText: {R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature can't block this turn.
mc.flavorText: The Krark Clan believes it's caught an ogre. The ogre believes he's caught seven goblins.

mc.name: Magnetic Theft
mc.oracleText: Attach target Equipment to target creature. (Control of the Equipment doesn't change.)
mc.printedText: Attach target Equipment to target creature. (Control of the Equipment doesn't change.)
mc.flavorText: Among the Vulshok, the most prized blades are those that killed their original owners.

mc.name: Magma Giant
mc.oracleText: When Magma Giant comes into play, it deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText: When Magma Giant comes into play, it deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.flavorText: Its open mouth is a furnace blast that blisters the skin. Its smoking fists are meteors that split the earth.

mc.name: Suntouched Myr
mc.oracleText: Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
mc.printedText: Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
mc.flavorText: As the fifth sun joins the other four, new abilities awaken in the creatures of Mirrodin.

mc.name: Wayfarer's Bauble
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: It is the forest beyond the horizon, the mountain waiting to be climbed, the new land across the endless sea.

mc.name: Ferropede
mc.oracleText:
Ferropede is unblockable.
Whenever Ferropede deals combat damage to a player, you may remove a counter from target permanent.
mc.printedText:
Ferropede is unblockable.
Whenever Ferropede deals combat damage to a player, you may remove a counter from target permanent.

mc.name: Ensouled Scimitar
mc.oracleText:
{3}: Ensouled Scimitar becomes a 1/5 Spirit artifact creature with flying until end of turn. (Equipment that's a creature can't equip a creature.)
Equipped creature gets +1/+5.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
mc.printedText:
{3}: Ensouled Scimitar becomes a 1/5 artifact creature with flying until end of turn. (Equipment that's a creature can't equip a creature.)
Equipped creature gets +1/+5.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

mc.name: Anodet Lurker
mc.oracleText: When Anodet Lurker is put into a graveyard from play, you gain 3 life.
mc.printedText: When Anodet Lurker is put into a graveyard from play, you gain 3 life.
mc.flavorText: These machines build fearsome visages out of scrap metal to scare off predators who would otherwise be eager to consume them.

mc.name: Sylvok Explorer
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
mc.flavorText: Any creature on a druid's shoulder is his family, any land under his feet his home.

mc.name: Clock of Omens
mc.oracleText: Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Untap target artifact.
mc.printedText: Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Untap target artifact.
mc.flavorText: Those near the clock don't hear it anymore, but their every movement is in time with its ticking.

mc.name: Blasting Station
mc.oracleText:
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Blasting Station deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Whenever a creature comes into play, you may untap Blasting Station.
mc.printedText:
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Blasting Station deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Whenever a creature comes into play, you may untap Blasting Station.

mc.name: Salvaging Station
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Return target noncreature artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to play.
Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from play, you may untap Salvaging Station.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Return target noncreature artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to play.
Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from play, you may untap Salvaging Station.

mc.name: Crucible of Worlds
mc.oracleText: You may play land cards from your graveyard.
mc.printedText: You may play land cards from your graveyard as though they were in your hand.
mc.flavorText: Amidst the darkest ashes grow the strongest seeds.

mc.name: Doubling Cube
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Double the amount of each type of mana in your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Double the amount of each type of mana in your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: The cube's surface is pockmarked with jagged runes that seem to shift when unobserved.

mc.name: Mycosynth Golem
mc.oracleText:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)
Artifact creature spells you play have affinity for artifacts. (They cost {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)
mc.printedText:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)
Artifact creature spells you play have affinity for artifacts. (They cost {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)

mc.name: Guardian Idol
mc.oracleText:
Guardian Idol comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{2}: Guardian Idol becomes a 2/2 Golem artifact creature until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Guardian Idol comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{2}: Guardian Idol becomes a 2/2 artifact creature until end of turn.

mc.name: Sawtooth Thresher
mc.oracleText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
Remove two +1/+1 counters from Sawtooth Thresher: Sawtooth Thresher gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
Remove two +1/+1 counters from Sawtooth Thresher: Sawtooth Thresher gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

mc.name: Infused Arrows
mc.oracleText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a charge counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
{T}, Remove X charge counters from Infused Arrows: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a charge counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
{T}, Remove X charge counters from Infused Arrows: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

mc.name: Vanquish
mc.oracleText: Destroy target blocking creature.
mc.printedText: Destroy target blocking creature.
mc.flavorText:
"All beings have an inner light. Let me show you yours."
--Ushanti, leonin seer

mc.name: Screaming Fury
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +5/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +5/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: He's got an axe to grind.

mc.name: Eon Hub
mc.oracleText: Players skip their upkeep steps.
mc.printedText: Players skip their upkeep steps.
mc.flavorText: Its power source is time itself. It absorbs unused minutes and hours, bringing the end of existence always closer.

mc.name: Tornado Elemental
mc.oracleText:
When Tornado Elemental comes into play, it deals 6 damage to each creature with flying.
You may have Tornado Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
mc.printedText:
When Tornado Elemental comes into play, it deals 6 damage to each creature with flying.
You may have Tornado Elemental deal its combat damage to defending player as though it weren't blocked.

mc.name: Rite of Passage
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature you control is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it. (The damage is dealt before the counter is put on.)
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature you control is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it. (The damage is dealt before the counter is put on.)
mc.flavorText: Every scar is a lesson, every battle a test of what you have learned.

mc.name: Auriok Salvagers
mc.oracleText: {1}{W}: Return target artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: {1}{W}: Return target artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: "Memnarch or the vedalken salvage most of the large machines, leaving us only scraps. Scraps are enough."

mc.name: Goblin Brawler
mc.oracleText:
First strike
Goblin Brawler can't be equipped.
mc.printedText:
First strike
Goblin Brawler can't be equipped.
mc.flavorText: Perhaps he shuns technology. Perhaps he appreciates nature. Perhaps he doesn't know the difference.

mc.name: Vulshok Sorcerer
mc.oracleText:
Haste
{T}: Vulshok Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
Haste
{T}: Vulshok Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Vulshok sorcerers train by leaping into electrified storm clouds. Dead or alive, they come back down with smiles on their faces.

mc.name: Night's Whisper
mc.oracleText: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
mc.printedText: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
mc.flavorText: The Moriok call the black moon the Whisperer. At her apex, she whispers of power.

mc.name: Magma Jet
mc.oracleText:
Magma Jet deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
Scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
mc.printedText:
Magma Jet deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
Scry 2 (Look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

Equipped creature gets +0/+2 and has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn."
{W}{W}: Attach Healer's Headdress to target creature you control.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

mc.name: Dross Crocodile
mc.flavorText: The necrogen may have taken its sight, but it can still taste the fear of its prey.

mc.name: Rain of Rust
mc.oracleText:
Choose one - Destroy target artifact; or destroy target land.
Entwine {3}{R} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
mc.printedText:
Choose one Destroy target artifact; or destroy target land.
Entwine {3}{R} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
mc.flavorText: On Mirrodin, mages who call upon the power of rust are shunned by their people and often turn mercenary to survive.

mc.name: Skyhunter Skirmisher
mc.oracleText: Flying, double strike (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach, and it deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
mc.printedText: Flying, double strike
mc.flavorText:
"Like dawn's first light, blind the unprepared and banish the shadows."
--Skyhunter creed

mc.name: All Suns' Dawn
mc.oracleText: For each color, return up to one target card of that color from your graveyard to your hand. Then remove All Suns' Dawn from the game.
mc.printedText: For each color, return up to one target card of that color from your graveyard to your hand. Then remove All Suns' Dawn from the game.

mc.name: Dawn's Reflection
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds two mana in any combination of colors to his or her mana pool.
mc.printedText: Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds two mana of any combination of colored mana to his or her mana pool.
mc.flavorText: Only Sylvok magic could truly capture the perfection of a Mirrodin sunrise.

mc.name: Condescend
mc.oracleText:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
Scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
mc.printedText:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
Scry 2 (Look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

mc.name: Grinding Station
mc.oracleText:
{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Whenever an artifact comes into play, you may untap Grinding Station.
mc.printedText:
{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Whenever an artifact comes into play, you may untap Grinding Station.

mc.name: Arachnoid
mc.oracleText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Arachnoid may block as though it had flying.
mc.flavorText: It follows the green sun over Mirrodin's surface, spinning massive webs of whispersilk as it goes.

mc.name: Skyreach Manta
mc.oracleText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
Flying
mc.printedText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
Flying
mc.flavorText: As the dawns break, the manta soars.

mc.name: Baton of Courage
mc.oracleText:
Flash
Sunburst (This comes into play with a charge counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
Remove a charge counter from Baton of Courage: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
You may play Baton of Courage any time you could play an instant.
Sunburst (This comes into play with a charge counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
Remove a charge counter from Baton of Courage: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Stasis Cocoon
mc.oracleText:
Enchant artifact
Enchanted artifact's activated abilities can't be played.
If enchanted artifact is a creature, it can't attack or block.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted artifact's activated abilities can't be played.
If enchanted artifact is a creature, it can't attack or block.
mc.flavorText: Though the grip of a golem is strong, the grip of Auriok magic is far stronger.

mc.name: Beacon of Tomorrows
mc.oracleText: Target player takes an extra turn after this one. Shuffle Beacon of Tomorrows into its owner's library.
mc.printedText: Target player takes an extra turn after this one. Shuffle Beacon of Tomorrows into its owner's library.
mc.flavorText: To look into its light is to meet the gaze of history.

mc.name: Beacon of Unrest
mc.oracleText: Put target artifact or creature card in a graveyard into play under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.
mc.printedText: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard into play under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.
mc.flavorText: A vertical scream pierces the night air and echoes doom through the clouds.

mc.name: Beacon of Destruction
mc.oracleText: Beacon of Destruction deals 5 damage to target creature or player. Shuffle Beacon of Destruction into its owner's library.
mc.printedText: Beacon of Destruction deals 5 damage to target creature or player. Shuffle Beacon of Destruction into its owner's library.
mc.flavorText: The Great Furnace's blessing is a spectacular sight, but the best view comes at a high cost.

mc.name: Beacon of Creation
mc.oracleText: Put a 1/1 green Insect creature token into play for each Forest you control. Shuffle Beacon of Creation into its owner's library.
mc.printedText: Put a 1/1 green Insect creature token into play for each Forest you control. Shuffle Beacon of Creation into its owner's library.
mc.flavorText: A chorus of life heralds the arrival of Mirrodin's final sun.

mc.name: Ferocious Charge
mc.oracleText:
Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
Scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
mc.printedText:
Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
Scry 2 (Look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

mc.name: Eternal Witness
mc.oracleText: When Eternal Witness comes into play, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: When Eternal Witness comes into play, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

mc.name: Solarion
mc.oracleText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
{T}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on Solarion.
mc.printedText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
{T}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on Solarion.

mc.name: Fold into Æther
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, its controller may put a creature card from his or her hand into play.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell. If you do, that spell's controller may put a creature card from his or her hand into play.
mc.flavorText: Aether portals drift across Mirrodin's surface, dragging creatures across time and space.

mc.name: Krark-Clan Ironworks
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice an artifact: Add {2} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice an artifact: Add {2} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: All the junk, refuse, and offal of the Krark Clan is diligently collected, melted down, and made into more junk, refuse, and offal.

mc.name: Blinkmoth Infusion
mc.oracleText:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)
Untap all artifacts.
mc.printedText:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)
Untap all artifacts.
mc.flavorText: Power begets power.

mc.name: Plunge into Darkness
mc.oracleText:
Choose one - Sacrifice any number of creatures, then you gain 3 life for each sacrificed creature; or pay X life, then look at the top X cards of your library, put one of those cards into your hand, and remove the rest from the game.
Entwine {B} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

Choose one Sacrifice any number of creatures, then you gain 3 life for each sacrificed creature; or pay X life, then look at the top X cards of your library, put one of those cards into your hand, and remove the rest from the game.
Entwine {B} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

mc.name: Arcbound Wanderer
mc.oracleText: Modular-Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost. When it's put into a graveyard, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
mc.printedText: Modular--Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost. When it's put into a graveyard, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

mc.name: Granulate
mc.oracleText: Destroy each nonland artifact with converted mana cost 4 or less.
mc.printedText: Destroy each nonland artifact with converted mana cost 4 or less.
mc.flavorText: There aren't that many ways to destroy a solid steel weapon, but somehow the goblins keep finding new ones.

mc.name: Leonin Squire
mc.oracleText: When Leonin Squire comes into play, return target artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: When Leonin Squire comes into play, return target artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText:
"I may be kha, but without my soldiers, my people, I am nothing."
--Raksha Golden Cub

mc.name: Etched Oracle
mc.oracleText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
{1}, Remove four +1/+1 counters from Etched Oracle: Target player draws three cards.
mc.printedText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
{1}, Remove four +1/+1 counters from Etched Oracle: Target player draws three cards.

mc.name: Mana Geyser
mc.oracleText: Add {R} to your mana pool for each tapped land your opponents control.
mc.printedText: Add {R} to your mana pool for each tapped land your opponents control.
mc.flavorText: The Quicksilver Sea hissed and bubbled at the indignity. The Vulshok shaman just smiled.

{T}: Put a 2/2 colorless Pincher creature token into play.

{T}: Put a 2/2 colorless Pincher creature token into play.

mc.name: Auriok Champion
mc.oracleText:
Protection from black and from red
Whenever another creature comes into play, you may gain 1 life.
mc.printedText:
Protection from black and from red
Whenever another creature comes into play, you may gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText:
"Her will shall banish the shadows. Her might shall punish the lawless. Her beauty shall restore the light."
--Ushanti, leonin seer

mc.name: Ion Storm
mc.oracleText: {1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter or a charge counter from a permanent you control: Ion Storm deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter or a charge counter from a permanent you control: Ion Storm deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: When enough artifacts lie too long in the same place, their magical radiation weakens reality, opening rifts of unpredictable destructive power.

mc.name: Joiner Adept
mc.oracleText: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
mc.printedText: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
mc.flavorText: A talented apprentice makes all things. The master makes all things possible.

mc.name: Razorgrass Screen

Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Razorgrass Screen blocks each turn if able.
mc.printedText:
(Walls can't attack.)
Razorgrass Screen blocks each turn if able.
mc.flavorText: Hand-stitched, and marked by the blood of the Auriok.

mc.printedText: Sacrifice Composite Golem: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: It binds the five suns in human form.

mc.name: Paradise Mantle
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature has "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

mc.printedText:

mc.name: Door to Nothingness
mc.oracleText:
Door to Nothingness comes into play tapped.
{W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Door to Nothingness: Target player loses the game.
mc.printedText:
Door to Nothingness comes into play tapped.
{W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Door to Nothingness: Target player loses the game.
mc.flavorText:
"All memory of your existence will be wiped from reality. You will die, and no one will mourn."
--Memnarch

mc.name: Circle of Protection: Artifacts
mc.oracleText: {2}: The next time an artifact source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
mc.printedText: {2}: The next time an artifact source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
mc.flavorText: "Memnarch shall rage against us. We shall endure."

mc.name: Plasma Elemental
mc.oracleText: Plasma Elemental is unblockable.
mc.printedText: Plasma Elemental is unblockable.
mc.flavorText:
"I watched a ship sail right through it. I thought it was harmless . . . until I saw what it had done to the crew."
--Bruenna, Neurok leader

mc.name: Reversal of Fortune
mc.oracleText: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You may copy an instant or sorcery card in it. If you do, you may play the copy without paying its mana cost.
mc.printedText: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You may copy an instant or sorcery card in it and play the copy without paying its mana cost.
mc.flavorText: "Why learn hundreds of spells when you can learn only one and use it to steal hundreds?"

mc.name: Channel the Suns
mc.oracleText: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: To some the birth of the fifth sun was a sign of doom. To others it was a sign of salvation. But to all it was a sign.

mc.name: Armed Response
mc.oracleText: Armed Response deals damage to target attacking creature equal to the number of Equipment you control.
mc.printedText: Armed Response deals damage to target attacking creature equal to the number of Equipment you control.
mc.flavorText: Raksha watched as the goblins continued to pour onto the Razor Fields. "They just don't know when to stop, do they?"

mc.name: Loxodon Stalwart
mc.oracleText:
Vigilance
{W}: Loxodon Stalwart gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Attacking doesn't cause Loxodon Stalwart to tap.
{W}: Loxodon Stalwart gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Long ago, the Auriok attempted peace with the loxodons. The leonin attempted war. Neither succeeded.

mc.name: Raksha Golden Cub
mc.oracleText:
Vigilance
As long as Raksha Golden Cub is equipped, Cat creatures you control get +2/+2 and have double strike.
mc.printedText:
Attacking doesn't cause Raksha Golden Cub to tap.
As long as Raksha is equipped, Cats you control get +2/+2 and have double strike.
mc.flavorText: Some believe that Raksha, youngest of the kha, is the reincarnation of Dakan, the first and mightiest of leonin leaders.

mc.name: Thought Courier
mc.oracleText: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
mc.printedText: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card from your hand.
mc.flavorText: It is telling of the vedalkens' culture that they trust human couriers more than their own comrades.

mc.name: Early Frost
mc.oracleText: Tap up to three target lands.
mc.printedText: Tap up to three target lands.
mc.flavorText: Under its mists, the earth sleeps.

mc.name: Spectral Shift
mc.oracleText:
Choose one - Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one basic land type with another; or change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (These effects don't end at end of turn.)
Entwine {2}
mc.printedText:
Choose one Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one basic land type with another; or change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (These effects don't end at end of turn.)
Entwine {2}

mc.name: Relentless Rats
mc.oracleText:
Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature in play named Relentless Rats.
A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.
mc.printedText:
Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature in play named Relentless Rats.
A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.

mc.name: Nim Grotesque
mc.oracleText: Nim Grotesque gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.
mc.printedText: Nim Grotesque gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.
mc.flavorText: In the swirling mists, you could walk right up to one and not know until its teeth are in your throat.

mc.name: Vicious Betrayal
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Vicious Betrayal, sacrifice any number of creatures.
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature sacrificed this way.
mc.printedText:
As an additional cost to play Vicious Betrayal, sacrifice any number of creatures.
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature sacrificed this way.

mc.name: Furnace Whelp
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Baby dragons can't figure out humans--if they didn't want to be killed, why were they made of meat and treasure?

mc.name: Spark Elemental
mc.oracleText:
Trample, haste (If this creature would deal enough combat damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player. This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At end of turn, sacrifice Spark Elemental.
mc.printedText:
Trample, haste
At end of turn, sacrifice Spark Elemental.
mc.flavorText: Vulshok shamans summon spark elementals to burn paths through thick underbrush--or through goblin salvage squads.

mc.name: Tel-Jilad Lifebreather
mc.oracleText: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate target creature.
mc.printedText: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate target creature.
mc.flavorText: "The Tangle loans you life. Spend it well."

mc.name: Viridian Scout
mc.oracleText: {2}{G}, Sacrifice Viridian Scout: Viridian Scout deals 2 damage to target creature with flying.
mc.printedText: {2}{G}, Sacrifice Viridian Scout: Viridian Scout deals 2 damage to target creature with flying.
mc.flavorText: They know a hoverguard's only blind spot is directly above it.

mc.name: Rude Awakening
mc.oracleText:
Choose one - Untap all lands you control; or until end of turn, lands you control become 2/2 creatures that are still lands.
Entwine {2}{G} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
mc.printedText:
Choose one Untap all lands you control; or until end of turn, lands you control become 2/2 creatures that are still lands.
Entwine {2}{G} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

mc.name: Cackling Imp
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{T}: Target player loses 1 life.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{T}: Target player loses 1 life.
mc.flavorText: Its laughter drives needles through your mind.

mc.name: Silent Arbiter
mc.oracleText:
No more than one creature can attack each combat.
No more than one creature can block each combat.
mc.printedText:
No more than one creature may attack each combat.
No more than one creature may block each combat.
mc.flavorText: Scholars say that arbiters exist on every world, created by an unknown hand to enforce justice.

mc.name: Eyes of the Watcher
mc.oracleText: Whenever you play an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
mc.printedText: Whenever you play an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

mc.name: Skullcage
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Skullcage deals 2 damage to that player unless he or she has exactly three or exactly four cards in hand.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Skullcage deals 2 damage to that player unless he or she has exactly three or exactly four cards in hand.
mc.flavorText: Only a focused mind can survive it.

mc.name: Lantern of Insight
mc.oracleText:
Each player plays with the top card of his or her library revealed.
{T}, Sacrifice Lantern of Insight: Target player shuffles his or her library.
mc.printedText:
Each player plays with the top card of his or her library revealed.
{T}, Sacrifice Lantern of Insight: Target player shuffles his or her library.
mc.flavorText: Each eye sees a different possibility for tomorrow.

mc.name: Spinal Parasite
mc.oracleText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
Remove two +1/+1 counters from Spinal Parasite: Remove a counter from target permanent.
mc.printedText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
Remove two +1/+1 counters from Spinal Parasite: Remove a counter from target permanent.

mc.name: Synod Centurion
mc.oracleText: When you control no other artifacts, sacrifice Synod Centurion.
mc.printedText: When you control no other artifacts, sacrifice Synod Centurion.
mc.flavorText:
"We order them to stand, they stand. We order them to wait, they wait. We order them to die, they die."
--Pontifex, elder researcher

mc.name: Battered Golem
mc.oracleText:
Battered Golem doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever an artifact comes into play, you may untap Battered Golem.
mc.printedText:
Battered Golem doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever an artifact comes into play, you may untap Battered Golem.
mc.flavorText: A dent marks every year of service, and it has as much rust as glory.

mc.name: Disruption Aura
mc.oracleText:
Enchant artifact
Enchanted artifact has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay its mana cost."
mc.printedText: Enchanted artifact has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay its mana cost."
mc.flavorText: Vedalken weapons sold to outsiders are as dependable as the vedalken themselves.
